title: UK launches military esports games to boost cyber skills

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **UK launches military esports games to boost cyber skills** — Military personnel from over 40 nations compete to sharpen cyber skills through gaming applying lessons from Ukraine's use of gaming technology in warfare.
- **Gurkhas lay to rest unknown war hero** — The poignant burial of an unknown soldier of World War 2 took place today in Arezzo, Italy, with a bearer party from the Gurkhas carrying him to his final resting place.
- **Transparency data: MOD: workforce management information January to December 2025** — Reports on departmental staff numbers and costs.
